description: This file defines a 'Header' UI component using LightningJS framework. The component renders a header bar with navigation elements, title, and styling, and includes methods for programmatic navigation and input handling.

methods.name: goHome
methods.description: Navigates to the home route ('/') using the router.

methods.name: goRestaurants
methods.description: Navigates to the restaurants route ('/') using the router.

methods.name: goCart
methods.description: Opens or toggles the cart via store method.

methods.name: goTrack
methods.description: Opens tracking view for the active order or a mock order.
